title: Construction of Games and Surreal Numbers
content: Model organization after organization of reals - see TOC

blocks.name: cpg
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the class of partisan game forms.

blocks.name: diff.cpg.s
diff.cpg.c
diff.cpg.w
df-pg
blocks.content: Define the class of partisan games. More precisely, this is the class of partisan game forms, many of which represent equal partisan games. In Metamath, equality between partisan games is represented by a different equivalence relation than class equality. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 22-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: elpglem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ elpg . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 28-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpglem1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)))
  anim12dan(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg))
  sstrd(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(s0)))
  elpwi(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(s0))
  simpl(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))
  sstrd(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))
  elpwi(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))
  simpl(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0), cpg)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cpg.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpglem1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))â†’((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  exlimiv(s0, (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))), ((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg))
  anim12dan(s0 âŠ† Pg, (1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg, (2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg)
  sstrd((1st ` c0), cpg, s0, (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§(1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))
  adantl(s0 âŠ† Pg, (1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (1st ` c0)âŠ† s0)
  elpwi((1st ` c0), s0)
  simpl(s0 âŠ† Pg, (1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))
  sstrd((2nd ` c0), cpg, s0, (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))
  adantl(s0 âŠ† Pg, (2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (2nd ` c0)âŠ† s0)
  elpwi((2nd ` c0), s0)
  simpl(s0 âŠ† Pg, (2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, (1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg, (2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (1st ` c0), cpg)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (2nd ` c0), cpg)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cpg.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpglem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ elpg . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 28-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpglem2(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  19.37iv(s0, wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  eximii(s0, wi(wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  isseti(s0, cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  unex(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  jctird(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wss(cv(s0), cpg))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wss(cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cpg))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), cpg)
  unss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  jca(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))
  sylibr(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(s0)))
  syl5sseqr(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  ssun1(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  elpw2(cfv(c1st, c0), cv(s0))
  sylibr(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))
  syl5sseqr(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  ssun2(cfv(c2nd, c0), cfv(c1st, c0))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cun(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  elpw2(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg))
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0), cpg)
  diff.wss.s(s0, cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)
  diff.cpg.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpglem2(setvar s0, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg)â†’ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  19.37iv(s0, ((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg), (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))
  eximii(s0, (((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg)â†’(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))), s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)))
  isseti(s0, ((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)))
  unex((1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  jctird(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), ((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg), s0 âŠ† Pg, ((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))
  biimprd(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), ((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg), s0 âŠ† Pg)
  syl6bbr(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), s0 âŠ† Pg, ((1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg), ((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0))âŠ† Pg)
  sseq1(s0, ((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), cpg)
  unss((1st ` c0), cpg, (2nd ` c0))
  jca(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), (1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))
  sylibr(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), (1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (1st ` c0)âŠ† s0)
  syl5sseqr((1st ` c0), s0, ((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)))
  ssun1((1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  elpw2((1st ` c0), s0)
  sylibr(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), (2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0), (2nd ` c0)âŠ† s0)
  syl5sseqr((2nd ` c0), s0, ((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)), s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)))
  ssun2((2nd ` c0), (1st ` c0))
  id(s0 =((1st ` c0)â‹ƒ(2nd ` c0)))
  elpw2((2nd ` c0), s0)
  vex(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (1st ` c0)âŠ† Pg, (2nd ` c0)âŠ† Pg)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (1st ` c0), cpg)
  diff.wss.s(s0, (2nd ` c0), cpg)
  diff.cpg.s(s0)
  diff.cun.s(s0, (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpglem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ elpg . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 28-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpglem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  bitri(wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  anbi2i(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cxp(cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  eleq2i(c0, cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0)), cxp(cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cv(s0)), cxp(cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  fvmpt(s1, cv(s0), universe, cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))), cxp(cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0))), cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1))))
  sqxpeqd(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  pweq(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(s1)), cpw(cv(s1)))))
  xpex(cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0)))
  pwex(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  elxp7(c0, cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0)))
  an12(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0)))))
  19.42v(s0, wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s0)))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm elpglem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0)))â†”(c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0))), (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§ âˆƒ(s0,(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))), âˆƒ(s0,(c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))))
  exbii(s0, (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0)), (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))))
  bitri((s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§ c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0)), (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§(s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))), (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§(c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))))
  anbi2i(s0 âŠ† Pg, c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0), (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))
  bitri(c0 âˆˆ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0), (c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ)âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))), c0 âˆˆ(P(s0)Ã— P(s0)))
  eleq2i(c0, ((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0), (P(s0)Ã— P(s0)))
  ax-mp(((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))` s0)=(P(s0)Ã— P(s0)), s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  fvmpt(s1, s0, universe, (s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1))), (P(s0)Ã— P(s0)), (P(s1)Ã— P(s1)))
  sqxpeqd(P(s1), P(s0), s1 = s0)
  pweq(s1, s0)
  eqid((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦(P(s1)Ã— P(s1))))
  xpex(P(s0), P(s0))
  pwex(s0)
  vex(s0)
  elxp7(c0, P(s0), P(s0))
  an12(s0 âŠ† Pg, c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), ((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)))
  19.42v(s0, c0 âˆˆ(ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ), (s0 âŠ† Pg âˆ§((1st ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0)âˆ§(2nd ` c0)âˆˆ P(s0))))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, P(s0), P(s0))
  diff.cpw.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (ğ•Œ Ã— ğ•Œ))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpg
blocks.content: Membership in the class of partisan games. In John Horton Conway's On Numbers and Games, this is stated as "If ` L ` and ` R ` are any two sets of games, then there is a game ` { L | R } ` . All games are constructed in this way." The first sentence corresponds to the backward direction of our theorem, and the second to the forward direction. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 27-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpg(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpg), w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cpg), w3a(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg))))
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)))
  impbii(wex(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(hs0)))))), wa(wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg)))
  elpglem1(hs0, c0)
  elpglem2(hs0, c0)
  bitri(wcel(c0, cpg), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wex(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpg), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpw(cv(hs0))))))), wex(hs0, wa(wss(cv(hs0), cpg), wcel(c0, cfv(cmpt(hs1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0))))))
  elsetrecs(hs0, c0, cpg, cmpt(hs1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1)))))
  df-pg(hs1)
  elpglem3(hs0, hs1, c0)
  3anass(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wss(cfv(c1st, c0), cpg), wss(cfv(c2nd, c0), cpg))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpg)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(hs1, universe, cxp(cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
